verses.verse: I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of mercy <S%H2617><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>: unto you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, will I sing <S%H2167><s%>.

I will behave myself wisely <S%H7919><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>. O when will you come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H1980><s%>? I will walk inside <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> with a perfect <S%H8537><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>.

I will set <S%H7896><s%> no wicked <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before my eyes <S%H5869><s%>: I hate <S%H8130><s%> the work <S%H6213><s%> of them that turn aside <S%H7750><s%>; it shall not cleave to me <S%H1692><s%>.
A perverse <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from me <S%H3045><s%>: I will not know a wicked person <S%H7451><s%>.

Whoever privately <S%H5643><s%> slanders <S%H3960><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, him will I cut off <S%H6789><s%>: him that has a high <S%H1362><s%> look <S%H5869><s%> and a proud <S%H7342><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will not I allow <S%H3201><s%>.

My eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be upon the faithful <S%H539><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, that they may live <S%H3427><s%> with me <S%H1980><s%>: he that walks in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall serve me <S%H8334><s%>.

He that works <S%H6213><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> shall not live <S%H3427><s%> inside <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>: he that tells <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall not stay <S%H3559><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>.

I will early <S%H1242><s%> destroy <S%H6789><s%> all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; that I may cut off <S%H3772><s%> all wicked <S%H205><s%> doers <S%H6466><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
